saśailevanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ haṭhatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena yadā jāgarti kuṇḍalī/
tadā sarvāṇi padmāni bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
prāṇasya śūnyapadavī
tadā rājapathāyate/
tadā cittaṃ nirālambaṃ tadā kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhraṃmahāpathaṃ/
śmaśānaṃ śāmbhavī madhyaṃmārgaś cety ekavācaka//
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena prabodhayatumīśvarī/
brahmadvāramukhe supto mudrābhyāsaṃ samācaret//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
uḍiyānaṃ mūla°bandha tato jālandharābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyā vajrolī śakticālanam/
idaṃ ca mudrādaśakaṃ jarāmarṇavināśanam//
ādināthoditaṃ divyam aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhīnāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva kartavyaṃ kulastrīsukharataṃ yathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoni saṃpīḍya dakṣiṇam/
padaṃ prasaritaṃ kṛtvā karābhyāṃ pūrayen mukhe//
kaṇṭha bandha samāropya dhārayed vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
yathā daṇḍāhataḥ sarpo daṇḍākāraḥ prajāyate//
rujvībhūtvā tathā śakti kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
tadāsau ramaṇāvasthā jāyate dvipuṭāśritā//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayena ca vegataḥ/
idaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhaiḥ praśasyate//
mahākleśādayo doṣā kṣīyante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahāmudrāṃ ca tenaiva vadanti vibudhottamāḥ//
candrāṅge ca samabhyasya sūryāṅge punar abhyaset/
yāvat tulyā bhavet saṃkhyā tato mudrāṃ vivarjayet//
na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
api bhuktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ piyuṣam iva jīryate//
kṣayakuṣṭhagudāvartagulmājīrṇapurogamā/
tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ yomabhyaset//
kathitoyaṃ mahāmudrā mahāsiddhikarī nṛṇām/
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit//
pārṣṇi vāmasya pādasya yonisthāne niyojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣaṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā tato vāyu hṛdaye cibukaṃ dṛḍham/
nibhṛtya yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
dhārayitvā yathāśaktyā recayed anilaṃ śanaiḥ//
savyāṅge pūrvam abhyasya dakṣāṅge punarbhyaset//
matāntare tu keṣāṃcit kaṇṭhabandha visarjayet/
rājadantabilaṃ jatra jihvayottaṃbhaved iti//
ayaṃ ṣalu mahābandho mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābandhamocayec cavicakṣaṇam//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnām ūrdhvaṃgativibodhakaḥ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpayen manaḥ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpannā yathā strī puruṣaṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahābandho mahāvedha(ṃ) vinānyathā//
mahāvedhasthito yogī kṛtvā pūrakaeva dhī/
vāyunā gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrayā//
samahastayugo bhūmau sphijau saṃtāḍayec chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya vāyu sphurati tatvaraṃ/
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgnisambandhā jāyate ca mṛtāya vai/
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato mṛtyubhayaṃ kutaḥ//
mahāvedho’yam abhyāsān mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valīpalitavedhaghnaṃ sevyate sādhakottamaṃ//
etat trayaṃ mahāguhyaṃ jarāmṛtyuvināśanam/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ caivam aṇimādiguṇapradam//
aṣṭadhā kriyate caikaṃ yāme yāme dine dine/
puṇyasahārasambhāvi pāpaughabhiduraṃ sadā//
samyakśikṣāvatāevaṃ svalpaṃ prathamasādhanaṃ/
vahnistrīpathasevānām ādau varjanaādṛśyet//
chedanacālanaṃ dohau kalā krameṇa vardhayet/
yāvad bhrūmadhyaṃ spṛśati tadānīṃ khecarīsiddhiḥ//
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī//
kalāṃ parāṅmukhī kṛtvā tripathe parivarjayet/
sa bhavet khecarī mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhati/
kṣaṇena mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na rogo maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā/
na bhra mūrchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarī//
cittaṃ carati khe yasyāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
tenaiva khecarī mudrā sarva siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryāṃ mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
tasya na kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calito’pi yadā binduḥ saṃprāptacāgnimaṇḍalaṃ/
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ haṭhāc chaktyānirodho yogamudrayā//

ūrdhvajihvā sthito bhūtvā somapānaṃ karoti yaḥ/
māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇaṃ śarīraṃ yasya yoginaṃ/
takṣakeṇāpi dṛṣṭasya viṣaṃ tasya na sparśati//
yindhanāni yathā vahnis tailavartiṃ ca dīpakaḥ/
tathā somakalāpūrṇaṃ dehī dehaṃ na mucyate//
gomāṃsaṃ bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇī/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ vidyāṃ itare kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluni/
gomāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tat tu mahāpātakanāśanam//
jihvāpraveśasaṃbhūtavahninonnāpitā daraṃ/
candrāt sravati yaḥ sāraṃ tasmād idam [m]akurvīta nityayuktaḥ samāhitaḥ sā syād amaravāruṇī//
mūrdhnaḥ ṣoḍaśapadmapattragalitaṃ prāṇād avāptaṃ haṭhāṃ-
varddhāsyo rasanāṃ vidhāya vivare śaktiṃ parāṃ cintayet/
utkallolajalākulaṃ su vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣaḥ sa mṛṇālakomalatanur yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā śiraḥsyandinī
sakṣārā kaṭukādya dugdhasadṛśī madhvādyatulyāṃtathā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jarāntakaraṇaṃ śāstrāgamodgīraṇaṃ
tasya syād aaramatvamm aṣṭaguṇitaṃsiddhāṅgaṇākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā ca khecarī/
eko devo nirālamba ekāvasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam iṣyate//
apānaṃ ca vidyūrdhagaṃ kurute balāt/
ākuñcanena taṃ prāhur mūlabandhaṃ hi yoginaḥ//
gudaṃ pārṣṇyā tu saṃpīḍya vāyum ākuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ yathā cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindu mūlabandhena caikataḥ/
gatvā yogasya saṃsiddhiṃ yacchato nātra saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇayor aikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt//
apānaṃ cordhvage jāte saṃyāte vahnimaṇḍalaṃ/
tadānalaśikhā dīrghā vardhate vāyunāhatā//
tato jāto vardhapānai prāṇam uṣma svarūpakam/
tenābhyantapradīptas tu jvalano dehajas tathā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā saṃtaptā sa prabudhyate/
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva viśvasya ṛjutāṃ vrajet//
bilaṃ praviṣṭaṃ ca tato brahmanāḍyantaraṃ vrajet/
tasmān nityaṃ mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
baddho yena suṣumṇāyāṃ prāṇatūḍiyate yataḥ/
tasmāuḍiyāṇākhye’yaṃ yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaṃ//
uḍīṇaṃ kurute yasmād aviśrāntaṃ mahākhagaḥ/
uḍiyāṇaṃ tad eva syāt tatra bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udarāt paścime bhāge nābher ūrdhvaṃ ca kārayet/
bandho mṛtyumātaṅga//
uḍiyāṇaṃ tu sahajaṃ gurūṇāṃ kathitaṃ sadā/
abhyāsātsatataṃ yas tu vṛddho’pi taruṇo bhavet//
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi tāṇaṃ kuryāt prayatnataḥ/
ṣaṇmāsaabhyasenn mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//
sati vajrāsane pādau karābhyāṃ dhārayed dṛḍham/
gulphadeśasamīpe ca kandaṃ tacca prapīḍyate//
paścimatāṇam udare kārayed dhṛdaye {crux }galecrux /

sarveṣām eva bandhānām uttamo hy uḍiyāṇakaḥ/
uḍiyāṇe dṛḍhe bandhe muktiḥ svābhāvikī bhavet//
kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayedṛḍham icchayā/
bandho jālandharākhyo’yaṃ amṛtavyayakārakaḥ//
badhnāti hi śirojālāṃmadhyegāmi nabhojalam/

svecchayā vartamāno’pi yogoktair niyamair vinā/

tatra vastudvayaṃ vakṣye durlabhaṃ yasya kasya cit/
